mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(max(measure_num), 0) FROM drilling_stress WHERE sensor_type = #{sensorType} AND tag = '1' AND mine_id = #{mineId} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY SUBSTRING(measure_num, -4) DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT measure_num FROM anchor_cable_stress as acs
acs.mine_id = #{mineId} AND acs.del_flag = '0'
AND acs.survey_area_name like concat('%',#{surveyAreaName},'%')

SELECT acs.anchor_cable_stress_id AS dataId, acs.measure_num AS measureNum, acs.workface_id AS workFaceId, acs.sensor_location AS sensorLocation, acs.sensor_type AS sensorType FROM anchor_cable_stress acs
acs.mine_id = #{mineId} AND acs.del_flag = '0'
AND ( acs.sensor_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR acs.workface_id IN ( SELECT bw.workface_id FROM biz_workface bw WHERE bw.workface_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND bw.del_flag = '0' AND bw.mine_id = #{mineId} ) )
ORDER BY acs.install_time DESC
